CommonFields.Title: Ionic aggregate dissolution and conduction in a plasticized single-ion polymer conductor
Author: O'Reilly, Michael V.
Masser, Hanqing
King, Daniel R.
Painter, Paul C.
Colby, Ralph H.
Winey, Karen I.
Runt, James

Matrix.Description: prepared with a two-step melt condensation reaction between PEG600 and a mixture of dimethyl 5-sulfoisophthalate sodium salt and dimethyl isophthalate

Dielectric_and_Impedance_Spectroscopy_An.Equipment: Novocontrol GmbH Concept 40 broadband dielectric spectrometer

data.description: relaxation frequency as a function of inverse temperature
DC conductivity as a function of inverse temperature
DC conductivity as a function of Tg/T
ion mobility as a function of inverse temperature
number density as a function of inverse temperature
